benchmark_details.name: T2-RAGBench (Text-and-Table Benchmark for Evaluating Retrieval-Augmented Generation)
benchmark_details.overview: T2-RAGBench is a benchmark comprising 32,908 question-context-answer triples, designed to evaluate Retrieval-Augmented Generation methods on real-world financial data involving both text and tables.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate existing Retrieval-Augmented Generation methods on text-table retrieval and numerical reasoning tasks.

data.source: Existing financial documents and QA datasets restructured for context independence.
data.annotation: Reformulated by language models with qualitative checks by financial experts.

methodology.calculation: Calculated based on the relevance of the retrieved documents against the ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Scores indicate the effectiveness of RAG methods in retrieving accurate financial data.
methodology.validation: Expert validation of question reformulation and numerical accuracy.
